channel.title: Ranks
channel.description:
if anyone could help me make a new rank cause i would love to have these ranks 0=player 1=mod 2=admin 3=hidden admin 4=co - owner 5 = owner
so if anyone could help me or tell me how to make these new ranks :) tysm

item.title: Ranks
item.dc:creator: @lord_dharok lord dharok
item.description:
@lord_dharok wrote:

no because owner is 3 for my server and 4 is hidden admin and player right 4 allows people to do owner commands and i dk why

Read full topic

item.title: Ranks
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You don’t need two seperate ranks for Owner & Co-owner, Hidden administrator is already 4, so there is no need to change that just for the sake of a different number. You don’t really need any changes in this, although if you do want it, and want specific crowns for each of these ranks, etc, you’ll have to post in Client help as it is related to that.

Read full topic

item.title: Ranks
item.dc:creator: @hyphy_ftw hyphy ftw
item.description:
@hyphy_ftw wrote:

They’re already in the server.
0 = player
1 = mod
2 = admin
3 = owner/co-owner
4 = hidden admin

Read full topic
